name: Order SMS Notification – WooCommerce
author: Sabbir Ahmed

sections.description:
This is a WooCommerce add-on. By Using this plugin admin and buyer can get notification about their order via sms using different SMS gateways.

The WooCommerce Order SMS Notification plugin for WordPress is very useful, when you want to get notified via SMS after placing an order. Buyer and seller both can get SMS notification after an order is placed. SMS notification options can be customized in the admin panel very easily.

Key Features

  • Very easy to install
  • Very easy to customize
  • Integrate TalkwithText and Clikcatell SMS Gateways
  • Admin can get Order SMS notifications
  • Buyer can get order sms notifications
  • Available settings for Admin to control SMS settings and gateways
  • Customizable SMS text
  • Send Order details ( order no, order status ) in SMS text
  • Extended Settings Option
  • Works with WooCommerce 2.0+
  • All version of WordPress 4.0+ supported

This plugin also have a premium version named WooCommerce Order SMS Notifications in codecanyon. In premium version there are lots of extended features like

  • Integrated 3 more most popular gateways ( Twillio, Nexmo, SMS Global, Hoiio, Intelli SMS )
  • Sending SMS to any number.
  • Sending Order Details ( order no, order status, order items and order amount ) in SMS text
  • Different SMS send corresponding to different Order Status
  • Directly contact with buyer via SMS.
  • Admin can force buyer to get sms notifications.
  • All order status supported.
sections.installation:
New Install via FTP

  1. Unzip the package woocommerce-order-sms-notification.zip on you computer.
  2. Upload the unzipped folder the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  4. Goto SMS Settings menu and set your options.

New Install via the WordPress uploader

  1. Click Plugins > Add New inside of your WordPress install.
  2. Click Upload and select the package woocommerce-order-sms-notification.zip
  3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  4. Goto SMS Settings menu and set your options.

Updating via the FTP

  1. If you’ve made any custom changes to the core you’ll need to merge those changes into the new package.
  2. Unzip the package woocommerce-order-sms-notification.zip on you computer.
  3. Replace the current folder in your plugins folder with the new unzipped folder from your computer.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial version released

2.0

  • Fix – Clickatell issue in message body
  • Fix – Talkwithtext api problem
  • Fix – Send Unexpected token error in order checkout
  • Fix – Add admin notice
  • Tweak – Infobip service added for talkwithtext gateway
  • Tweak – Code Clean up and some hooks and filter

short_description: A plugin for sending SMS notification after placing orders using WooCommerce
